title: Network-Based Internet Risk Prevention Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet usage and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: A language curriculum-linked program for pre-service teachers, applying network-based instructional design in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Identify eight types of internet risks (cyberbullying, sexting, online grooming, digital dating violence, problematic internet use, nomophobia, gaming/gambling addiction) and explain prevention strategies
Analyze risk interactions and develop integrated educational scenarios using networked learning design
Design validity verification tools to measure educational effectiveness based on pre-post assessment data
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
